data.title: The Derby Crown Fits Stoute, The Doyen Of The 'Sport Of Kings'
data.meta_description: "He is no longer a spring chicken but he has not lost his talent," Michael Holding told AFP regarding Michael Stoute, the trainer who proved his close friend right on Saturday by winning his sixth Epsom Derby.

The Derby Crown Fits Stoute, The Doyen Of The 'Sport Of Kings'

"He is no longer a spring chicken but he has not lost his talent," Michael Holding told AFP regarding Michael Stoute, the trainer who proved his close friend right on Saturday by winning his sixth Epsom Derby.
